welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content: # Welcome ## About jscord is a versatile, straightforward [node.js](https://nodejs.org) library for Discord. ## Installation Like any npm package, you need to have [node.js](https://nodejs.org) installed. Then, from the command line in your project's directory, run the following: `npm install jscord` You're all set! Make sure to read the documentation if you're ever confused.

connecting.name: Connecting

classes.name: Bot
classes.description: This is the core bot object that you will use to connect to just about anything related to Discord.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Connects to Discord using your bot account

methods.name: log
methods.description: Logs a message to console with a timestamp. An alias for Logger#log() if you don't want to create a {@link Logger} object.

params.name: obj
params.description: The message you're logging to console

methods.name: error
methods.description: Logs an error to console with a timestamp. An alias for Logger#error() if you don't want to create a {@link Logger} object.

params.name: obj
params.description: The error you're logging to console

events.name: ready
events.description: Emitted when the bot is ready.

events.name: message
events.description: Emitted when a message is created.

classes.name: Logger
classes.description: Utility class to help streamline the process of logging information to console.
